content: @WG-prioritization I was documenting our process, take a look at it here https://hackmd.io/pHb6eTZ2Sjy6XZmwXZHIBA?view
there are some things to fix, feel free to make comments and we can all together try to come up with a final version
I've started from the Github meta issue and there are some things that doesn't seem actionable in the way they are
would be nice if we define on each step what to do precisely, non actionable things won't help
btw ... feel free to fix things, rephrase with better english and do whatever you consider would be better for the document

// FIXME what do we want to do with unprioritized T-compiler?

Would it be useful to have something like a chart to decide which priority to assign?
you meant, something that helps us decide what priority assign to a given issue?
yeah, we would need to start documenting stuff like that I'd say
